agent_2_agent_protocol.definition: A unified 'Thinking Mesh' protocol allowing local CLI agents and cloud-deployed swarms to share a single reasoning context.
key_features: Shared Context State: Local terminal history is instantly accessible to cloud agents.
Satellite Bridge: The 'Mini CLI Satellite' (v0.22.6) acts as a low-latency uplink.
Handshake Spec: A JSON-based manifest exchange (node_id, capabilities) establishes the secure mesh.
Default Message Bus: Streamlines communication between distributed agent components.
agent_2_agent_protocol.impact: Eliminates the 'air gap' between local development environments and production AI swarms.

native_audio_reasoning.definition: Direct processing of audio modalities without intermediate text transcription layers.
capabilities: Zero-Shot Audio Analysis: Understanding tone, emotion, and overlapping speech directly.
Real-Time War Room: Enables low-latency voice interaction for strategic planning.
Multimodal Function Responses: Audio input can trigger code execution and visual outputs.

features: Gemini 3 Pro/Flash support via Preview Features

deployment_plan.step_1: Establish Satellite Uplink: Connect local CLI (v0.22.6+) to the Web Command Center using the Handshake Spec.
deployment_plan.step_2: Activate Drive Mesh: Enable 'scan_drive' capability to index local assets for the cloud swarm.
deployment_plan.step_3: Deploy Native Audio Node: Spin up the 'gemini-2.5-flash-native-audio' worker for War Room comms.
deployment_plan.step_4: Verify A2A Protocol: Test bidirectional signal transmission (SIG_TX / SIG_ACK) between CLI and Web.
